title: Streamixio
author: Streamixio
created_time: November 26, 2022, 02:11:25 PMLast edit: January 31, 2023, 09:18:34 AM by Streamixio
content: Free unlimited Virtual and Physical VISA cards

comments.author: dkbit98
comments.body: Unlimited cards? ¬† Can you please explain how this is possible and how is this related with Bitcoin?I have doubt whenever I hear word unlimited, especially in business that is related with crypto and cards.Domain is really weird, and it is recently created that increases risk of using this service, and same goes with UK registered company that is often used by scammers.

comments.author: conrad90
comments.body: As much as I'd love to make use of this service, I find it very hard to believe this unlimited statement. Is this essentially a competitor to wise, revolut, monese and so on? If so what does this have to do with BTC?Is KYC required? What limitations are in place? Unlimited virtual cards, what spending limits are there?

comments.author: Streamixio
comments.created_time: November 27, 2022, 02:44:08 PMLast edit: November 28, 2022, 09:56:40 PM by Mr. Big
comments.body: Quote from: dkbit98 on November 26, 2022, 11:22:45 PMUnlimited cards? ¬† Can you please explain how this is possible and how is this related with Bitcoin?I have doubt whenever I hear word unlimited, especially in business that is related with crypto and cards.Domain is really weird, and it is recently created that increases risk of using this service, and same goes with UK registered company that is often used by scammers.Hey Dkbit98,It‚Äôs related; If your company is registered in the United Kingdom, the service is free and does as it says.Also remember it‚Äôs free to check out which will enable you to make an informed decision and provide first-hand feedback based on your experience. So yes, have a browse and thank you me later üôÇAnd to confirm yes, unlimited virtual /physical cards and you get an extra ¬£20 free when you sign up and message customer services BITCOINTALK2022.Quote from: conrad90 on November 27, 2022, 12:13:22 AMAs much as I'd love to make use of this service, I find it very hard to believe this unlimited statement. Is this essentially a competitor to wise, revolut, monese and so on? If so what does this have to do with BTC?Is KYC required? What limitations are in place? Unlimited virtual cards, what spending limits are there?Hi Conrad90,It‚Äôs related, if your company is registered in the United Kingdom, the service is free and does as it says.You set your own company spend limits on all the cards you create. KYC requirements are a scan of your local photo identification, your residential proof of address and your certificate of incorporation if the company is already registered.All countries and mobile numbers accepted. Cards physical cards shipped tracked by Royal mail signed.Also remember it‚Äôs free to check out which will enable to make an informed decision and provide first had feedback based on your experience. So yes, have a browse and thank you me later üôÇAnd to confirm yes, unlimited virtual /physical cards and you get an extra ¬£20 free when you sign up and message customer services BITCOINTALK2022.And to confirm yes, unlimited virtual /physical cards and you get an extra ¬£20 free when you sign up and message customer services BITCOINTALK2022.

comments.body: How to create an account? Do you have tutorial?
